# UpdateAppAccountTokenRequest

**Object**

The request body that contains an app account token value.

## Declaration

```swift
object UpdateAppAccountTokenRequest
```

## Discussion

This is the request body for the [doc://com.apple.appstoreserverapi/documentation/AppStoreServerAPI/Set-App-Account-Token] endpoint.

## App Account Token

- **Set App Account Token**: Sets the app account token value for a purchase the customer makes outside of your app, or updates its value in an existing transaction.
